title: Sum of Slice Elements
description: Return the sum of all numbers in a slice using a loop.

title: Find Maximum Number
description: Find the largest number in a slice.

title: Count Vowels in String
description: Count how many vowels appear in a string.

title: Remove Duplicate Elements
description: Remove duplicates from a slice while preserving order.

title: Check Palindrome
description: Check if a string is palindrome (case insensitive).

title: Word Frequency Map
description: Given a sentence, return frequency of each word.

title: Sort Strings Alphabetically
description: Sort a slice of strings alphabetically.

title: Filter Even Numbers
description: Return only even numbers from a slice.

title: Square Each Number
description: Return a slice where each value is squared.

title: Check Key in Map
description: Return true if a map contains a specific key.
